name: Pizza Maker Chef - Kitchen Cooking Game
name_original: Pizza Maker Chef - Kitchen Cooking Game
description:
Let's start making some delicious hot spicy pizza! In this cooking game you are welcome to try a different pizza recipe and reveal your skills.

$ Simple, fun and challenging, suitable for all ages
$ Reveal your creativity, can be played by entire family
$ Real pizza recipe using ingredients as in real life
$ Easy tap and drag game play
$ Cool background music and HD graphics

You have to make a delicious pizza following a recipe.
We want you to have an excellent experience playing it, that's why we tried to come up with a simply solution that can be played by anyone, no time running, just relax and enjoy!
Here are some indication for you to succeed:

1. Cut, chop and prepare the vegetables you will use on this pizza recipe: onions, tomato, green peppers
2. Prepare the dough by mixing all the ingredients: flour, oil, salt, water, sugar and others. You will have to use a mixer to make a perfect dough
3. Stretch your dough and start adding ingredients to it: salami, peppers, sauce, cheese and whatever else you like
4. Bake your pizza on a hot oven, then it's ready to be served.

Your opinion is very important to us so let us know how you feel about this game.
In order to improve our work, don't forget to rate it.
